I finally got the registered version yesterday. I can't hardly wait 
to go through all scenarios.

I noticed a few interesting things so far (so I cheated to get extra 
money to find these interesting things):

Why does an archer run after being close to lots of exploding bolts 
exploding? I had an archer up to 400 on everything but experience and 
his experience level was 40. I was launching lots of exploding bolts 
close to a wall and he started to run away on his own.

Also, I had slime upto 180 on everything but experience (experience 
level was 20). When I left a scenario I had only 15 team members of
my 
 team, most were slime), I got ready to purchase another team member 
and I couldn't. I checked the view of my team and behold, the number 
of slimes had surpassed 30!!

Who can do the most damage in a single attack to a character: archer, 
cleric, mage, archmage, fire elemental, or druid?

I have a suggest new power for ghost: Possession. A ghost could 
possess the body of an ally or friend for a limited period of time 
and use the attacks of the possessed.  While the ghost is possessing, 
 all damage is inflicted upon the body of the possessed.  If the
ghost 
 is possessing a druid, all faeries produced are on the side of the 
ghost.  If the ghost is possessing a cleric, all ghosts and skeletons 
produced are on the side of the ghost or the ghost could use the 
cleric's resurrection ability to create a new body (of character type 
chosen by the ghost) for the ghost.
